languages.text: "Я скажу: ты наконец стал похож на человека, Сол. Способного что-то чувствовать. И если для этого тебе пришлось малеха рехнуться... что ж. В этом ты точно не одинок".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Ты рехнулся". {n}Поймав недоуменные взгляды, Джай разводит руками.{/n} "Что? Он сам попросил!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "I'll tell you this: you finally look like a person, Sol. Like someone who is capable of feeling something. And if a few of your screws had to come loose for you to get there, well... you're definitely not alone in that."
languages.original_text: "Я скажу: ты наконец стал похож на человека, Сол. Способного что-то чувствовать. И если для этого тебе пришлось малеха рехнуться... что ж. В этом ты точно не одинок".

"I'll tell you this: you finally look like a person, Sol. Like someone who is capable of feeling something. And if a few of your screws had to come loose for you to get there, well... you're definitely not alone in that."

languages.text: "Ich muss sagen, dass Ihr endlich ausseht wie ein menschliches Wesen, Sol. Wie jemand, der zu Gefühlen fähig ist. Und wenn dafür ein paar lockere Schrauben erforderlich waren, nun ... damit seid Ihr definitiv nicht allein."
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you this: you finally look like a person, Sol. Like someone who is capable of feeling something. And if a few of your screws had to come loose for you to get there, well... you're definitely not alone in that."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss sagen, dass Ihr endlich ausseht wie ein menschliches Wesen, Sol. Wie jemand, der zu Gefühlen fähig ist. Und wenn dafür ein paar lockere Schrauben erforderlich waren, nun ... damit seid Ihr definitiv nicht allein."

languages.text: « Je vais vous dire un truc, Sol : vous ressemblez enfin un peu à un être humain. Un humain capable de ressentir quelque chose. Et si pour ça, il a fallu que vous pétiez les plombs... eh bien... sachez que vous êtes pas le seul dans ce cas. »
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you this: you finally look like a person, Sol. Like someone who is capable of feeling something. And if a few of your screws had to come loose for you to get there, well... you're definitely not alone in that."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais vous dire un truc, Sol : vous ressemblez enfin un peu à un être humain. Un humain capable de ressentir quelque chose. Et si pour ça, il a fallu que vous pétiez les plombs... eh bien... sachez que vous êtes pas le seul dans ce cas. »

languages.text: “我就这么说吧，你现在终于像个人了，小索，你终于算是有那么点感情了。如果你只有稍微发点疯，才能更像个正常人的话，这么说吧……这种人绝对不是只有你一个。”
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you this: you finally look like a person, Sol. Like someone who is capable of feeling something. And if a few of your screws had to come loose for you to get there, well... you're definitely not alone in that."

traits.locale_text: “我就这么说吧，你现在终于像个人了，小索，你终于算是有那么点感情了。如果你只有稍微发点疯，才能更像个正常人的话，这么说吧……这种人绝对不是只有你一个。”

languages.text: «Puedo decir que por fin pareces una persona, Sol. Alguien capaz de sentir algo. Y si han tenido que aflojarse algunos tornillos en tu cabeza para llegar a este punto, bueno... no estás solo en eso».
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you this: you finally look like a person, Sol. Like someone who is capable of feeling something. And if a few of your screws had to come loose for you to get there, well... you're definitely not alone in that."

traits.locale_text: «Puedo decir que por fin pareces una persona, Sol. Alguien capaz de sentir algo. Y si han tenido que aflojarse algunos tornillos en tu cabeza para llegar a este punto, bueno... no estás solo en eso».

languages.text: 「言わせてもらうわ、ソル。やっと人間らしい顔になったじゃない。何かを感じられる人間に見えるわ。それに、そこにたどり着くためにネジが何本か外れたっていうなら…まあ、そういうのはアンタだけじゃないわよ」
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you this: you finally look like a person, Sol. Like someone who is capable of feeling something. And if a few of your screws had to come loose for you to get there, well... you're definitely not alone in that."

traits.locale_text: 「言わせてもらうわ、ソル。やっと人間らしい顔になったじゃない。何かを感じられる人間に見えるわ。それに、そこにたどり着くためにネジが何本か外れたっていうなら…まあ、そういうのはアンタだけじゃないわよ」

languages.text: "Sana şunu söyleyeyim, sonunda insana benzemeye başladın Sol. Bir şeyler hissedebilen birine... Bu noktaya varmak için birkaç vidanın gevşemesi gerektiyse bile... Bu konuda kesinlikle yalnız değilsin."
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you this: you finally look like a person, Sol. Like someone who is capable of feeling something. And if a few of your screws had to come loose for you to get there, well... you're definitely not alone in that."

traits.locale_text: "Sana şunu söyleyeyim, sonunda bir insana benziyorsun Sol. Bir şeyler hissedebilen birine... Bu noktaya varmak için birkaç vidanın gevşemesi gerektiyse bile... Bu konuda kesinlikle yalnız değilsin."
